question: 1. A binary image consists of disks of sizes 3,7,9,15,17 pixels. We want to remove all the disks of size less than 13 pixels. Which morphological opeartion perform the task?

answers.a: Erosion with structuring element(disk) of size 15
answers.b: Erosion with structuring element(disk) of size 13
answers.c: Dilation with structuring element(disk) of size 15
answers.d: Dilation with structuring element(disk) of size 13

question: 2. Which morphological operation is used for smoothing the contour of an object in grayscale image
